title: Electronic Performance Support System (EPSS) Training for Scientific Research Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, research design concepts, and comprehension of experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment integrating mathematical research methodologies for medical students. Provides non-interactive system-linked support via Moodle-based EPSS

learning_goals: Learners can independently conduct experimental designs based on scientific research methodologies
Learners can systematically document research data analysis processes using EPSS (Electronic Performance Support Systems)
Learners can interpret research results by applying statistical significance verification procedures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
